content:
So now we know how much €£$ EU countries pay for #Covid_19 vaccines (€12 a dose for #PfizerBioNTech) thank to Belgian Secretary of state for budget @EvaDeBleeker
Is the UK paying more or less?
What's the price of being on your own when negotiating contracts like these? #Brexit
date:
Quote TweetCEO@corporateeurope · Dec 18, 2020Accidental #transparency: a Belgian minister has revealed the EU's #COVID19 vaccine deal prices in a tweet that was since removed.

Prices paid to pharmaceutical companies range from €1.78 per dose (AstraZeneca) to $18 (Moderna).

#ShowUsTheContracts

https://politico.eu/article/belgian-secretary-of-state-accidentally-reveals-eu-vaccine-prices/…Show this thread
